original_text: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel, Whosoever he be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth any of his seed unto Molech; he shall surely be put to death: the people of the land shall stone him with stones.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 또 이르라 그가 이스라엘 자손이든지 이스라엘에 거류하는 거류민이든지 그의 자식을 몰렉에게 주면 반드시 죽이되 그 지방 사람이 돌로 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel
Whosoever he be of the children of Israel
or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel
that giveth any of his seed unto Molech
he shall surely be put to death
the people of the land shall stone him with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 백성이 그를 돌로 쳐서 죽이리라
